name: Thittuvilai Jumma Masjid
description: Thittuvilai Jumma Masjid, located in Kanyakumari district, is a prominent Islamic center known for its community engagement and spiritual gatherings. It serves as a place of worship and cultural exchange, hosting religious activities and fostering unity among worshippers through educational programs and social initiatives. The masjid stands as a symbol of Islamic heritage and communal harmony in the region.
